meanings.definition: A book of magic spells and invocations.
meanings.sent1: She found an ancient grimoire hidden in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The witch consulted her grimoire for the right spell.
meanings.sent3: The grimoire seemed to have a mind of its own, flipping pages on its own.
meanings.sent4: His grimoire was a treasure trove of mystical knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The grimoire glowed with an otherworldly light, beckoning her to open it.

meanings.definition: A manual of magic or witchcraft.
meanings.sent1: The young wizard studied his grimoire diligently.
meanings.sent2: In the grimoire, she found the secret to brewing potions.
meanings.sent3: The grimoire's instructions on summoning a familiar were surprisingly detailed.
meanings.sent4: His grimoire was like a key to unlocking the mysteries of the arcane world.
meanings.sent5: The grimoire's cover was adorned with intricate symbols, hinting at its power.
